interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vktech Hair Buns Accessories 2pcs Sponge Swelling Curvature Volume Hair Base
Review Date: 2014/05/16
Store: Vktech
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {}
Review Text: I was excited when I ordered these because I like to make a high poof ponytail from time to time. Unfortunately, these are not going to give me the kind of poof I am looking for because both of them are way too small. They do not compare to Bumpits, which I currently use. The reason I wanted to get these is because I thought it would not show as much as the plastic Bumpits and I thought it would give the same effect. These are not even big enough to give the effect the picture shows. A little disappointed with these! Will have to keep searching for sponges that are big enough. :(
Review Title: Too small, not exactly like the picture shows!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
User Summary:

- **Preference for Hair Accessories**: The user frequently seeks products that enhance hairstyles, particularly those that create volume and height, such as poofy ponytails.
- **Disappointment with Size**: The user has emphasized the importance of product size and effectiveness, expressing dissatisfaction when the actual product does not meet their expectations or match promotional images.
- **Comparison to Competitors**: They have experience with other hair accessories, indicating a preference for items that provide comparable results to those they have successfully used in the past.  
- **Value for Aesthetic**: The user prefers hair accessories that blend discreetly with their hair, hinting at an interest in products that are less visible than popular options.
- **Seeking the Right Fit**: Overall, they are actively searching for the right solutions for hair volume and are critical of products that do not deliver on their promises. 

This user profile suggests a focus on quality, effectiveness, and visual discretion in hair accessories.
